item.description:
Join us for our FIRST Brunch!

We will be going to Sunday Brunch @ Jamie's in Whitman on Sunday, October 29th @ 11:30am. Located on Route 18 less than 100 yards from the intersection of Route 27, Jamie's offers a wide variety of food sure to please everyone's palate. Their brunch includes an omelette station as well as ample breakfast and lunch foods, fruit, and desserts.

This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan our next Dining Out event.

Restaurant 4-1-1: 769 Bedford Street (Route 18), Whitman, MA ~ 781-447-8680; Cost: $9.95pp plus tax, tip and beverages

Please see our "About" page for full details.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.

Organizer: Angela

***Please Note: Reservations must be finalized by 8pm on Saturday, October 28th.***

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group Sunday Brunch!
